trends: There have been no other sightings in Kalama
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: We saw 4 accounts of bright orb 3 on video
divs: Sighting DetailsPlease dont discount date of 4th of july. On that night the kids saw a bright orb cross the night sky. After hearing them ruckus about it again, I pulled my camera to capture the second one. Tenty minute's after the first cross the entire night sky from west to eadt over kalama Washington. It happened 3 more times. Many families and two generations of military dads witnessed all accounts. The audio and video speak for themselves.
